attempts.output_sql:
SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM catalog_sales, item, date_dim, precomputed_agg
WHERE
  i_manufact_id = 29
  AND i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
  AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
    CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
  )
  AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  AND cs_item_sk = precomputed_agg.item_key
  AND cs_ext_discount_amt > precomputed_agg.threshold
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM catalog_sales
JOIN item
  ON i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
JOIN filtered_dates
  ON d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
WHERE
  i_manufact_id = 29
  AND cs_ext_discount_amt > (
    SELECT
      1.3 * AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt)
    FROM catalog_sales
    JOIN filtered_dates
      ON d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
    WHERE
      cs_item_sk = i_item_sk
  )
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM (
  SELECT
    cs_ext_discount_amt,
    cs_item_sk,
    AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt) OVER (PARTITION BY cs_item_sk) * 1.3 AS avg_discount_threshold
  FROM catalog_sales, item, date_dim
  WHERE
    i_manufact_id = 29
    AND i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
    AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
      CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
    )
    AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
) AS sub
WHERE
  cs_ext_discount_amt > avg_discount_threshold
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM (
  SELECT
    cs_ext_discount_amt,
    cs_item_sk,
    AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt) OVER (PARTITION BY cs_item_sk) * 1.3 AS avg_discount_threshold
  FROM catalog_sales
  INNER JOIN item ON i_item_sk = cs_item_sk AND i_manufact_id = 29
  INNER JOIN date_dim ON d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk 
    AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY)
) AS sub
WHERE
  cs_ext_discount_amt > avg_discount_threshold
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM combined_cte
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM item, date_dim, catalog_sales
WHERE
  i_manufact_id = 29
  AND i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
  AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
    CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
  )
  AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  AND cs_ext_discount_amt > (
    SELECT
      1.3 * AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt)
    FROM catalog_sales, date_dim
    WHERE
      cs_item_sk = i_item_sk
      AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
        CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
      )
      AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  )
LIMIT 100

WITH combined_aggregates AS (
  SELECT
    cs_item_sk,
    SUM(CASE WHEN i_manufact_id = 29 THEN cs_ext_discount_amt ELSE 0 END) AS total_discount,
    AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS avg_discount_per_item
  FROM catalog_sales
  JOIN date_dim
    ON d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  LEFT JOIN item
    ON i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
  WHERE
    d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
      CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
    )
    AND (
      i_manufact_id = 29 OR i_manufact_id IS NULL
    )
  GROUP BY
    cs_item_sk
)
SELECT
  SUM(total_discount) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM combined_aggregates AS ca
JOIN item
  ON i_item_sk = ca.cs_item_sk
WHERE
  i_manufact_id = 29 AND total_discount > 1.3 * avg_discount_per_item
LIMIT 100

select sum(cs_ext_discount_amt)  as "excess discount amount" 
from 
   catalog_sales 
   ,item 
   ,date_dim
where
i_manufact_id = 29
and i_item_sk = cs_item_sk 
and d_date between '1999-01-07' and 
        (cast('1999-01-07' as date) + INTERVAL 90 DAY)
and d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk 
and cs_ext_discount_amt  
     > ( 
         select 
            1.3 * avg(cs_ext_discount_amt) 
         from 
            catalog_sales 
           ,date_dim
         where 
              cs_item_sk = i_item_sk 
          and d_date between '1999-01-07' and
                             (cast('1999-01-07' as date) + INTERVAL 90 DAY)
          and d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk 
      )
 LIMIT 100

WITH item_avg_discount AS (
  SELECT
    cs_item_sk,
    1.3 * AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS avg_discount_amt
  FROM catalog_sales, date_dim
  WHERE
    d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
      CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
    )
    AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  GROUP BY
    cs_item_sk
)
SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM catalog_sales, item, date_dim, item_avg_discount
WHERE
  i_manufact_id = 29
  AND i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
  AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
    CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
  )
  AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  AND cs_item_sk = item_avg_discount.cs_item_sk
  AND cs_ext_discount_amt > item_avg_discount.avg_discount_amt
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM item, date_dim, catalog_sales
WHERE
  i_manufact_id = 29
  AND i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
  AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
    CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
  )
  AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  AND cs_ext_discount_amt > (
    SELECT
      1.3 * AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt)
    FROM date_dim, catalog_sales
    WHERE
      cs_item_sk = i_item_sk
      AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
        CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
      )
      AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  )
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  excess_discount_amount AS "excess discount amount"
FROM combined_scan
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM item
JOIN catalog_sales
  ON i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
JOIN date_dim
  ON d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    cs_item_sk,
    1.3 * AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS avg_disc_amt
  FROM catalog_sales AS cs2
  JOIN date_dim AS d2
    ON d2.d_date_sk = cs2.cs_sold_date_sk
  WHERE
    d2.d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
      CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
    )
  GROUP BY
    cs_item_sk
) AS subq
  ON cs_item_sk = subq.cs_item_sk
WHERE
  i_manufact_id = 29
  AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
    CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
  )
  AND cs_ext_discount_amt > COALESCE(subq.avg_disc_amt, 0)
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM (
  SELECT
    cs_ext_discount_amt,
    cs_item_sk,
    AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt) OVER (PARTITION BY cs_item_sk) * 1.3 AS avg_discount_threshold
  FROM item
  INNER JOIN catalog_sales
    ON i_item_sk = cs_item_sk AND i_manufact_id = 29
  INNER JOIN date_dim
    ON d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
    AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
      CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
    )
) AS sub
WHERE
  cs_ext_discount_amt > avg_discount_threshold
LIMIT 100

WITH avg_discount_by_item AS (
  SELECT
    cs_item_sk,
    1.3 * AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS avg_disc_amt
  FROM catalog_sales, date_dim
  WHERE
    d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
      CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
    )
    AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  GROUP BY
    cs_item_sk
)
SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM catalog_sales, item, date_dim, avg_discount_by_item
WHERE
  i_manufact_id = 29
  AND i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
  AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
    CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
  )
  AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
  AND cs_item_sk = avg_discount_by_item.cs_item_sk
  AND cs_ext_discount_amt > avg_discount_by_item.avg_disc_amt
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUM(cs_ext_discount_amt) AS "excess discount amount"
FROM (
  SELECT
    cs_ext_discount_amt,
    cs_item_sk,
    AVG(cs_ext_discount_amt) OVER (PARTITION BY cs_item_sk) * 1.3 AS avg_discount_threshold
  FROM catalog_sales, item, date_dim
  WHERE
    i_manufact_id = 29
    AND i_item_sk = cs_item_sk
    AND d_date BETWEEN '1999-01-07' AND (
      CAST('1999-01-07' AS DATE) + INTERVAL '90' DAY
    )
    AND d_date_sk = cs_sold_date_sk
) AS sub
WHERE
  cs_ext_discount_amt > avg_discount_threshold
LIMIT 100
